languages.text: "Лучше всего, конечно, всякие техноштуки. Сломанные — не беда, починим или на винтики разберем. Ну а если где раздобыли такую мерзкую дрянь, что всякие чистоплюи-торговцы даже смотреть не хотят, то не бойтесь, несите мне. Мы с ребятками найдем, куда пристроить!"

traits.locale_text: "Лучше всего, конечно, всякие техноштуки. Сломанные — не беда, починим или на винтики разберем. Ну а если где раздобыли такую мерзкую дрянь, что всякие чистоплюи-торговцы даже смотреть не хотят, то не бойтесь, несите мне. Мы с ребятками найдем, куда пристроить!"

languages.text: "Tech is always the best. If it's broke — no sweat, we'll fix it or take it apart. And if you score something so nasty that your fussy everyday traders won't even look at it, fear not, just bring it on over. Leave it to me and my boys to find the right buyer!"
languages.original_text: "Лучше всего, конечно, всякие техноштуки. Сломанные — не беда, починим или на винтики разберем. Ну а если где раздобыли такую мерзкую дрянь, что всякие чистоплюи-торговцы даже смотреть не хотят, то не бойтесь, несите мне. Мы с ребятками найдем, куда пристроить!"

traits.locale_text: "Tech is always the best. If it's broke — no sweat, we'll fix it or take it apart. And if you score something so nasty that your fussy everyday traders won't even look at it, fear not, just bring it over. Leave it to me and my cats to find the right buyer!"

"Tech is always the best. If it's broke — no sweat, we'll fix it or take it apart. And if you score something so nasty that your fussy everyday traders won't even look at it, fear not, just bring it over. Leave it to me and my cats to find the right buyer!"

"Tech is always the best. If it's broke — no sweat, we'll fix it or take it apart. And if you score something so nasty that your fussy everyday traders won't even look at it, fear not, just bring it on over. Leave it to me and my boys to find the right buyer!"

"Tech is always the best. If it's broke — no sweat, we'll fix it or take it apart. And if you score something so nasty that your fussy everyday traders won't even look at it, fear not, just bring it on over. Leave it to me and my boys to find the right buyer!"

"Tech is always the best. If it's broke — no sweat, we'll fix it or take it apart. And if you score something so nasty that your fussy everyday traders won't even look at it, fear not, just bring it on over. Leave it to me and my boys to find the right buyer!"

languages.text: “技术物品总归是最好的。就算坏了也不要紧，我们会把它们修好，或者把它们拆掉。如果你的货物实在是太烂了，普通的商人根本连看都不想看的话，也不用担心，只要拿到我这里就好。我和我的小伙子们会负责找到合适的买家！”
languages.original_text: "Tech is always the best. If it's broke — no sweat, we'll fix it or take it apart. And if you score something so nasty that your fussy everyday traders won't even look at it, fear not, just bring it on over. Leave it to me and my boys to find the right buyer!"

traits.locale_text: “技术物品总归是最好的。就算坏了也不要紧，我们会把它们修好，或者把它们拆掉。如果你的货物实在是太烂了，普通的商人根本连看都不想看的话，也不用担心，只要拿到我这里就好。我和我的小伙子们会负责找到合适的买家！”

languages.text: «La tecnología es lo mejor. Si está rota, no se preocupe. La arreglaremos o la desguazaremos. Y si consigue algo tan desagradable que los mercaderes normales se niegan a mirarlo, tráigalo. ¡Los muchachos y yo encontraremos a un comprador!».
languages.original_text: "Tech is always the best. If it's broke — no sweat, we'll fix it or take it apart. And if you score something so nasty that your fussy everyday traders won't even look at it, fear not, just bring it on over. Leave it to me and my boys to find the right buyer!"

traits.locale_text: «La tecnología es lo mejor. Si está rota, no se preocupe. La arreglaremos o la desguazaremos. Y si consigue algo tan desagradable que los mercaderes normales se niegan a mirarlo, tráigalo. ¡Los muchachos y yo encontraremos a un comprador!».

languages.text: 「機械系が一番だね。壊れていてもうちで直すか、分解するから問題ない。一般的な商人が見向きもしないような代物を手に入れたとしても大丈夫！とりあえず持ってきてくれ。あたしとあたしの部下たちの手にかかれば、すぐに買い手が見つかる！」
languages.original_text: "Tech is always the best. If it's broke — no sweat, we'll fix it or take it apart. And if you score something so nasty that your fussy everyday traders won't even look at it, fear not, just bring it on over. Leave it to me and my boys to find the right buyer!"

traits.locale_text: 「機械系が一番だね。壊れていてもうちで直すか、分解するから問題ない。一般的な商人が見向きもしないような代物を手に入れたとしても大丈夫！とりあえず持ってきてくれ。あたしとあたしの部下たちの手にかかれば、すぐに買い手が見つかる！」

languages.text: "Am besten ist immer Tech. Auch kaputt – das ist kein Problem, wie reparieren sie oder schlachten sie aus. Und wenn Ihr etwas so Übles habt, dass alle normalen Händler nicht einmal einen Blick darauf wagen, bringt es einfach her. Meine Jungs und ich finden schon den richtigen Käufer!"
languages.original_text: "Tech is always the best. If it's broke — no sweat, we'll fix it or take it apart. And if you score something so nasty that your fussy everyday traders won't even look at it, fear not, just bring it on over. Leave it to me and my boys to find the right buyer!"

traits.locale_text: "Am besten ist immer Tech. Auch kaputt – das ist kein Problem, wie reparieren sie oder schlachten sie aus. Und wenn Ihr etwas so Übles habt, dass alle normalen Händler nicht einmal einen Blick darauf wagen, bringt es einfach her. Meine Jungs und ich finden schon den richtigen Käufer!"

languages.text: « La technologie, c'est toujours un must. Un appareil cassé, pas de problème : on le répare ou on le démonte. Et si vous mettez la main sur un truc tellement répugnant que les autres marchands font la fine bouche, vous n'aurez qu'à me l'apporter. Mes gars et moi, on trouvera toujours un acheteur ! »
languages.original_text: "Tech is always the best. If it's broke — no sweat, we'll fix it or take it apart. And if you score something so nasty that your fussy everyday traders won't even look at it, fear not, just bring it on over. Leave it to me and my boys to find the right buyer!"

traits.locale_text: « La technologie, c'est toujours un must. Un appareil cassé, pas de problème : on le répare ou on le démonte. Et si vous mettez la main sur un truc tellement répugnant que les autres marchands font la fine bouche, vous n'aurez qu'à me l'apporter. Mes gars et moi, on trouvera toujours un acheteur ! »

languages.text: "Teknolojik ürünler en güzelidir. Bozuk olsa da sıkıntı değil, ya tamir ederiz ya da parçalarına ayırırız. Vasat, müşkülpesent tacirlerin suratına bile bakmayacağı kadar nahoş bir şeyler bulmayı başarırsan hiç endişen olmasın, bize getirsen yeter. Bizim oğlanlarla birlikte doğru alıcıyı buluruz!"
languages.original_text: "Tech is always the best. If it's broke — no sweat, we'll fix it or take it apart. And if you score something so nasty that your fussy everyday traders won't even look at it, fear not, just bring it on over. Leave it to me and my boys to find the right buyer!"

traits.locale_text: "En güzeli teknoloji. Bozuk olsa da sıkıntı değil, ya tamir ederiz ya da parçalarına ayırırız. Vasat, müşkülpesent tacirlerin suratına bile bakmayacağı kadar nahoş bir şeyler bulmayı başarırsan hiç endişen olmasın, bize getirsen yeter. Bizim oğlanlarla birlikte doğru alıcıyı buluruz!"
